name: 16 Sporks: Full Derp Version
description:
SO, AT THE MOMENT, THIS PROJECT IS CANCELLED TEMPORARILY.

THIS STORY HAS EVOLVED WITH ME THROUGH THE YEARS AND HAS PERSONAL VALUE TO ME

AND, HONESTLY, IF IT EVER GOT ANY RECOGNITION, I WOULDN'T LIKE IT TO BE KNOWN AS THAT IRONICALLY SHITTY GAME WITH HOMESTUCK-ESQUE HUMOUR.

I DID THIS FOR THE LOLs, AND I'M NOT SURE IT WAS A GOOD IDEA TO BEGIN WITH.

BECAUSE OF THAT, I'LL STILL WORK ON THIS STORY AND IT'S CHARACTERS/LORE/ETC., BUT NOT IN THIS FORMAT.

So, what's all this about?:

Well, it's a project of my own, called "16 Sporks". It tells the story about 16 chosen warriors to save the world from miserable, Horrifying, and NASTY creatures torturing such innocent pipol.

It features:

  • Drama
  • Swear words
  • HD artworks
  • Parallel narrative
  • Memes
  • Majyicks
  • Furries and hoomans
  • And the most important thing:

Meaningful decisions!

Tired of that shit where, no matter what you choose, the story will always take the same route of events? Well, no more!

You want a character to be a bad goonie? Check!

You want some of them dead right from the beggining? Of course you want! Some of the can be really annoying! (oops, spoiler?)
